segments.text: Why don't we Chinese have our own Valentine's Day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course we have . It's on the seventh day of the seventh lunar month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is said that the Cowherd and the Spinster , the lover stars in heaven , can only meet on the seventh Eve , so this day has become the Lover's Day .
segments.speaker: S2
